event.title: April), when very little rainfall occurs

data.event: Monsoonal influences are strong, and the two seasons are the wet season and the dry season (November to April), when very little rainfall occurs.
January thru March features the highest relative humidity levels of the year, while May thru August is very sunny, consistently averaging above 60% of possible sunshine.
With monthly percent possible sunshine ranging from 46% in February to 67% in May, the city receives 2,558 hours of sunshine annually, a level not seen in the southern half of China outside of Tibet.

event.title: remains above 26.0 째C (78.8 째F) from June

data.event: The average low temperature remains above 26.0 째C (78.8 째F) from June to August.
